Open the "bilibili" application.
Click the plus icon located on the bottom menu bar.
Click the search bar at the top of the screen to initiate a search.
Click the "search" button to initiate a search.
Input "ASMR" into the search bar.
Finalize the search by pressing the Enter key.
Click the "搜索历史" expand button to display the full search history.
Click the "Search" button to initiate a search.
Click the "search" button, navigating to the search interface.
